title: Your main has to fight the champion you hate the most
body:
What happens.

In my case

{{champion:48}} would probably beat {{champion:67}} into a bloody mist, and then probably eat the remains.

trolls are not the most gentlemanly of beings. also I don't think think the weak magic in demacia would help vayne prepare against a real monster.

replies.body: {{champion:86}} attempts to finally put that demon squirral {{champion:150}} out of his misery, but unfortunately he gets kited to death and never gets a hit off.

{{champion:103}} vs {{champion:105}} 
 I doubt she's stupid enough to go in the water but.. You've all seen those shark movies... Sigh...
{{champion:240}} would stab the hell out of {{champion:105}} and roast him on a spit.

{{champion:24}} {{champion:114}} 

If we ever get to see what happens after Jax's color story then we would know what happens. (Though if he uses a real weapon she doesn't even come close to standing a chance)
the hardest part of my example was choosing just one champion. there are a LOT of champions I rather dislike for the crime of existing.
My lord {{champion:17}}  would most certainly bash that degenerate {{champion:11}}  into hell itself
Anything to do with bashing the shit out of {{champion:17}} is fair game.

{{champion:202}} & {{champion:119}}
Depends on how stupid Draven is. If he steps on the traps he watched me put down and runs from me in a straight line, he deserves to die.

{{champion:119}} _"I'll just ult him!"_
{{champion:202}} Side steps both times and ults. _"Get off my stage."_
After a while {{champion:75}}  has 5000 stacks and just doesn't care anymore
Talon would most certainly kill a 9 tailed fox with a magical floating orb.

{{champion:96}}  vs {{champion:69}} AP Kog wins this one all around. Just continously kite with E and R until they die. AD Kog has to itemize with heavy MR and go for a wits end guinsoos build. A bit rough if Cass is ahead but due to QSS and range he should still come out on top. 

On a side note a bit interesting that Kog is champion:96 while Cass is champion:69
